e: ￹`Cima~ `ko~ `pa~`paso'elin~`en~ `ita~?￺Who can we believe?￻誰值得我們信任？
￹`Pa~`so'elin~`en~ `ko~ `sowal~ `ako~.￺Believe what I say.￻請相信我所說的話
￹`O~ `maan~ `ko~ `ni~`paso'elin~`an~ `iso~?￺What doctrine do you believe?￻你相信什麼呢？
d.f: ￹￺to believe * literally to cause / make out to be true * to have confidence￻相信，信任；字面上說那是真的理由；有確信
